verses.plain: He answered me then, and said, Measure thou the time diligently in itself: and when thou seest part of the signs past, which I have told thee before,

tokens.t: He answered me then, and said, Measure thou the time diligently in itself: and when thou seest part of the signs past, which I have told thee before,

verses.plain: Then shalt thou understand, that it is the very same time, wherein the Highest will begin to visit the world which he made.

tokens.t: Then shalt thou understand, that it is the very same time, wherein the Highest will begin to visit the world which he made.

verses.plain: Therefore when there shall be seen earthquakes and uproars of the people in the world:

tokens.t: Therefore when there shall be seen earthquakes and uproars of the people in the world:

verses.plain: Then shalt thou well understand, that the most High spake of those things from the days that were before thee, even from the beginning.

tokens.t: Then shalt thou well understand, that the most High spake of those things from the days that were before thee, even from the beginning.

verses.plain: For like as all that is made in the world hath a beginning and an end, and the end is manifest:

tokens.t: For like as all that is made in the world hath a beginning and an end, and the end is manifest:

verses.plain: Even so the times also of the Highest have plain beginnings in wonder and powerful works, and endings in effects and signs.

tokens.t: Even so the times also of the Highest have plain beginnings in wonder and powerful works, and endings in effects and signs.

verses.plain: And every one that shall be saved, and shall be able to escape by his works, and by faith, whereby ye have believed,

tokens.t: And every one that shall be saved, and shall be able to escape by his works, and by faith, whereby ye have believed,

verses.plain: Shall be preserved from the said perils, and shall see my salvation in my land, and within my borders: for I have sanctified them for me from the beginning.

tokens.t: Shall be preserved from the said perils, and shall see my salvation in my land, and within my borders: for I have sanctified them for me from the beginning.

verses.plain: Then shall they be in pitiful case, which now have abused my ways: and they that have cast them away despitefully shall dwell in torments.

tokens.t: Then shall they be in pitiful case, which now have abused my ways: and they that have cast them away despitefully shall dwell in torments.

verses.plain: For such as in their life have received benefits, and have not known me;

tokens.t: For such as in their life have received benefits, and have not known me;

verses.plain: And they that have loathed my law, while they had yet liberty, and, when as yet place of repentance was open unto them, understood not, but despised it;

tokens.t: And they that have loathed my law, while they had yet liberty, and, when as yet place of repentance was open unto them, understood not, but despised it;

verses.plain: The same must know it after death by pain.

tokens.t: The same must know it after death by pain.

verses.plain: And therefore be thou not curious how the ungodly shall be punished, and when: but enquire how the righteous shall be saved, whose the world is, and for whom the world is created.

tokens.t: And therefore be thou not curious how the ungodly shall be punished, and when: but enquire how the righteous shall be saved, whose the world is, and for whom the world is created.

verses.plain: Then answered I and said,

tokens.t: Then answered I and said,

verses.plain: I have said before, and now do speak, and will speak it also hereafter, that there be many more of them which perish, than of them which shall be saved:

tokens.t: I have said before, and now do speak, and will speak it also hereafter, that there be many more of them which perish, than of them which shall be saved:

verses.plain: Like as a wave is greater than a drop.

tokens.t: Like as a wave is greater than a drop.

verses.plain: And he answered me, saying, Like as the field is, so is also the seed; as the flowers be, such are the colours also; such as the workman is, such also is the work; and as the husbandman is himself, so is his husbandry also: for it was the time of the world.

tokens.t: And he answered me, saying, Like as the field is, so is also the seed; as the flowers be, such are the colours also; such as the workman is, such also is the work; and as the husbandman is himself, so is his husbandry also: for it was the time of the world.

verses.plain: And now when I prepared the world, which was not yet made, even for them to dwell in that now live, no man spake against me.

tokens.t: And now when I prepared the world, which was not yet made, even for them to dwell in that now live, no man spake against me.

verses.plain: For then every one obeyed: but now the manners of them which are created in this world that is made are corrupted by a perpetual seed, and by a law which is unsearchable rid themselves.

tokens.t: For then every one obeyed: but now the manners of them which are created in this world that is made are corrupted by a perpetual seed, and by a law which is unsearchable rid themselves.

verses.plain: So I considered the world, and, behold, there was peril because of the devices that were come into it.

tokens.t: So I considered the world, and, behold, there was peril because of the devices that were come into it.

verses.plain: And I saw, and spared it greatly, and have kept me a grape of the cluster, and a plant of a great people.

tokens.t: And I saw, and spared it greatly, and have kept me a grape of the cluster, and a plant of a great people.

verses.plain: Let the multitude perish then, which was born in vain; and let my grape be kept, and my plant; for with great labour have I made it perfect.

tokens.t: Let the multitude perish then, which was born in vain; and let my grape be kept, and my plant; for with great labour have I made it perfect.

verses.plain: Nevertheless, if thou wilt cease yet seven days more, (but thou shalt not fast in them,

tokens.t: Nevertheless, if thou wilt cease yet seven days more, (but thou shalt not fast in them,

verses.plain: But go into a field of flowers, where no house is builded, and eat only the flowers of the field; taste no flesh, drink no wine, but eat flowers only;)

tokens.t: But go into a field of flowers, where no house is builded, and eat only the flowers of the field; taste no flesh, drink no wine, but eat flowers only;)

verses.plain: And pray unto the Highest continually, then will I come and talk with thee.

tokens.t: And pray unto the Highest continually, then will I come and talk with thee.

verses.plain: So I went my way into the field which is called Ardath, like as he commanded me; and there I sat among the flowers, and did eat of the herbs of the field, and the meat of the same satisfied me.

tokens.t: So I went my way into the field which is called Ardath, like as he commanded me; and there I sat among the flowers, and did eat of the herbs of the field, and the meat of the same satisfied me.

verses.plain: After seven days I sat upon the grass, and my heart was vexed within me, like as before:

tokens.t: After seven days I sat upon the grass, and my heart was vexed within me, like as before:

verses.plain: And I opened my mouth, and began to talk before the most High, and said,

tokens.t: And I opened my mouth, and began to talk before the most High, and said,

verses.plain: O Lord, thou that shewest thyself unto us, thou wast shewed unto our fathers in the wilderness, in a place where no man treadeth, in a barren place, when they came out of Egypt.

tokens.t: O Lord, thou that shewest thyself unto us, thou wast shewed unto our fathers in the wilderness, in a place where no man treadeth, in a barren place, when they came out of Egypt.

verses.plain: And thou spakest saying, Hear me, O Israel; and mark my words, thou seed of Jacob.

tokens.t: And thou spakest saying, Hear me, O Israel; and mark my words, thou seed of Jacob.

verses.plain: For, behold, I sow my law in you, and it shall bring fruit in you, and ye shall be honoured in it for ever.

tokens.t: For, behold, I sow my law in you, and it shall bring fruit in you, and ye shall be honoured in it for ever.

verses.plain: But our fathers, which received the law, kept it not, and observed not thy ordinances: and though the fruit of thy law did not perish, neither could it, for it was thine;

tokens.t: But our fathers, which received the law, kept it not, and observed not thy ordinances: and though the fruit of thy law did not perish, neither could it, for it was thine;

verses.plain: Yet they that received it perished, because they kept not the thing that was sown in them.

tokens.t: Yet they that received it perished, because they kept not the thing that was sown in them.

verses.plain: And, lo, it is a custom, when the ground hath received seed, or the sea a ship, or any vessel meat or drink, that, that being perished wherein it was sown or cast into,

tokens.t: And, lo, it is a custom, when the ground hath received seed, or the sea a ship, or any vessel meat or drink, that, that being perished wherein it was sown or cast into,

verses.plain: That thing also which was sown, or cast therein, or received, doth perish, and remaineth not with us: but with us it hath not happened so.

tokens.t: That thing also which was sown, or cast therein, or received, doth perish, and remaineth not with us: but with us it hath not happened so.

verses.plain: For we that have received the law perish by sin, and our heart also which received it

tokens.t: For we that have received the law perish by sin, and our heart also which received it

verses.plain: Notwithstanding the law perisheth not, but remaineth in his force.

tokens.t: Notwithstanding the law perisheth not, but remaineth in his force.

verses.plain: And when I spake these things in my heart, I looked back with mine eyes, and upon the right side I saw a woman, and, behold, she mourned and wept with a loud voice, and was much grieved in heart, and her clothes were rent, and she had ashes upon her head.

tokens.t: And when I spake these things in my heart, I looked back with mine eyes, and upon the right side I saw a woman, and, behold, she mourned and wept with a loud voice, and was much grieved in heart, and her clothes were rent, and she had ashes upon her head.

verses.plain: Then let I my thoughts go that I was in, and turned me unto her,

tokens.t: Then let I my thoughts go that I was in, and turned me unto her,

verses.plain: And said unto her, Wherefore weepest thou? why art thou so grieved in thy mind?

tokens.t: And said unto her, Wherefore weepest thou? why art thou so grieved in thy mind?

verses.plain: And she said unto me, Sir, let me alone, that I may bewail myself, and add unto my sorrow, for I am sore vexed in my mind, and brought very low.

tokens.t: And she said unto me, Sir, let me alone, that I may bewail myself, and add unto my sorrow, for I am sore vexed in my mind, and brought very low.

verses.plain: And I said unto her, What aileth thee? tell me.

tokens.t: And I said unto her, What aileth thee? tell me.

verses.plain: She said unto me, I thy servant have been barren, and had no child, though I had an husband thirty years,

tokens.t: She said unto me, I thy servant have been barren, and had no child, though I had an husband thirty years,

verses.plain: And those thirty years I did nothing else day and night, and every hour, but make my, prayer to the Highest.

tokens.t: And those thirty years I did nothing else day and night, and every hour, but make my, prayer to the Highest.

verses.plain: After thirty years God heard me thine handmaid, looked upon my misery, considered my trouble, and gave me a son: and I was very glad of him, so was my husband also, and all my neighbours: and we gave great honour unto the Almighty.

tokens.t: After thirty years God heard me thine handmaid, looked upon my misery, considered my trouble, and gave me a son: and I was very glad of him, so was my husband also, and all my neighbours: and we gave great honour unto the Almighty.

verses.plain: And I nourished him with great travail.

tokens.t: And I nourished him with great travail.

verses.plain: So when he grew up, and came to the time that he should have a wife, I made a feast.

tokens.t: So when he grew up, and came to the time that he should have a wife, I made a feast.
